generated_description: wray bend, legally known as wray bend architectural metal company, based in hutchinson, kansas, is a family-owned business that specializes in architectural metal cladding systems. founded in 1939 as wray and sons roofing, the company has been a leader in the industry for over 80 years. ryan wray, a grandson of the original founder, established wray bend in 1997. the company offers a diverse portfolio, including acm, fibre cement, single skin corrugated panels, and standing seam roofing, and has worked on various types of structures.
